synopsis.p: Creates tuples for each element of a Cartesian product.

description.p: evaluates as an element list with the corpus as the context element. Each item is hereby called the anchor. evaluates all values of as lists of elements with the anchor as the context element. Then it creates a tuple for each item of the cartesian product of the result of the evaluation of . The tuple will have an argument for each item with the role specified by the keys of .

param-doc.name: relationName
param-doc.p: Name of the relation to which tuples are added.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: constantRelationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each relation created by this module

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: constantTupleFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each tuple created by this module

param-doc.name: anchor
param-doc.p: Elements from which arguments are evaluated.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
